tool_description:
Arizona's Official Lottery API for Powerball, Mega Millions, The Pick, Triple Twist, Fantasy 5, and Pick 3.
Arizona's Official Scratcher API for 500X, $100 or $200, Diamond Mine, and Fat Wallet.
name: Arizona Lottery
title: Arizona Lottery

api_list.name: Winning Locations
Fat Wallet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://arizona-lottery.p.rapidapi.com/v2/fastplay/143"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arizona-lottery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://arizona-lottery.p.rapidapi.com/v2/drawgames/drawings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arizona-lottery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
